definition: to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to induce/to promote/to urge/to impel/to bring about/to provoke/to drive (sb to do sth)/to catalyze/to actuate/to contribute to (some development)
mission/long-term task to which one devotes oneself/a calling

sentences.english: It was easily good enough for pole so that was the main thing.
sentences.chinese: 那一圈跑得不錯，足以使我獲得杆位，那是最主要的。

sentences.english: John has a windfall . It surprises his wife greatly .
sentences.chinese: 約翰意外獲得一筆財富，使他夫人大喫一驚。

sentences.english: He won a few headers and calmed things down.
sentences.chinese: 贏得了幾次頭球爭頂並且使情況穩定下來。

sentences.english: The nature of the stimulus may predispose some children to attention problems.
sentences.chinese: 刺激本身很可能使一些孩子易產生注意力問題。

sentences.english: But even that makes insecure Pakistanis jumpy.
sentences.chinese: 但是即使那樣也使感覺不安全的巴基斯坦人心驚肉跳。

sentences.english: The sound of happy laughters called up memories of his childhood.
sentences.chinese: 這些歡笑聲使他回憶起童年時代。

sentences.english: This great victory changed the complexion of the war .
sentences.chinese: 這次大捷使這戰爭改觀。

sentences.english: The breath of Jehovah, like a stream of brimstone , Sets it on fire.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華的氣如一股硫磺火，使它着起來。

sentences.english: In what direction should the pilot head in order to travel due north ?
sentences.chinese: 爲使這架飛機向正北航行，駕駛員應取什麼航向？

sentences.english: Their DNA was also loosening up and making memory genes more active.
sentences.chinese: 它們的DNA也鬆開了，使記憶體基因更加活躍。

sentences.english: Hunting without a license will land you in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 無證狩獵將會使你陷入麻煩。

sentences.english: Art ceramic tiles add luster to the walls of your kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 藝術瓷磚，使您廚房四壁增輝。

sentences.english: The doctor burst a blood vessel.
sentences.chinese: 醫生使一條血管破裂了。

sentences.english: The controls line up so that they can be read like an English sentence.
sentences.chinese: 控件整隊排列，使它們讀起來像一個英語句子。

sentences.english: The mobile phone has already enabled developing countries to skip fixed-line networks.
sentences.chinese: 移動電話已經使發展中國家跨越了固話網絡這個階段。

sentences.english: The effect of atomizing is better and burning is more full by improving nozzle structure inside and outside.
sentences.chinese: 同時改進燒嘴結構，使霧化效果更好，燃燒更加完全。

definition: to induce/to promote/to urge/to impel/to bring about/to provoke/to drive (sb to do sth)/to catalyze/to actuate/to contribute to (some development)
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
able to/so that sb can/enabling/in order to/finally in a position to/with sth in view
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
